about_us_title: Openexpo is your go to place for live online events
about_us_herotext: Our platform gives the unique feel to each and every one of the event organisers and attendees.
about_us_expect_text: You can expect that we  deliver information in an intuitive and simple manner. Our goal is for the attendee to be entertained and to receive the information they truly need with our recommendations
about_us_choose_text: We turn virtual events into the most realistic programs that you and your attendees may find memorable and fulfilling.
about_us_choose_bottom_bold: Bringing these and way more to you at your comfort
about_us_choose_bottom: We are experienced professionals who share a common goal in ensuring that the purpose of organising your events is fulfilled. Even if you maybe hosting an offline event, we can provide an online touch with a wider reach and impact.
about_us_foxlist_title: What can you achieve with us
about_us_foxlist_text: We turn virtual events into the most realistic programs that you and your attendees may find memorable and fulfilling.
about_us_fox_item_1_title: Manage the event by cross-boarder staff
about_us_fox_item_1_text: Assign the staff to the event from any part of the world in an unlimited manner
about_us_fox_item_2_text: Whether your company has a large database of partners or you just need to provide a booth for your exhibitors, there is no limit to the number of booths you can host on the event
about_us_fox_item_3_text: Our platform comes with the out-of-the-box video broadcast functionality. Let your attendees view your 'talks' live
about_us_interactivity_title:
More interactivity?
Weâ€™ve got you covered
about_us_interactivity_text: Your attendees may also be able to send messages, complete polls, and have a chance to explore your event stands for more interactive and highly engaging sessions.
about_us_accordeon_1_text: Apart from live broadcasts we also offer the chat functionality, let the attendees communicate with the exhibitors in a text fashion
about_us_accordeon_2_text: Whilst the attendee is on the live broadcast or your sponsor would like to create a poll for the audience, they can do this without a problem
about_us_accordeon_3_text: Discover all the stands and don't forget that the attendee will be able to view all of them on top of that they will see recommendations based on their needs
about_us_accordeon_4_text: This is our small killer feature, let the sponsors create a wheel of fortune on the event with prizes. Any attendee can win!
